summary: A hard-working young man meets and falls in love with his sister's bridesmaid. He soon finds out how disturbed she really is.
cast: Benoît Magimel|Laura Smet|Aurore Clément|Bernard Le Coq|Solène Bouton|Anna Mihalcea|Michel Duchaussoy|Suzanne Flon|Éric Seigne|Pierre-François Dumeniaud|Philippe Duclos|Thomas Chabrol|Isolde Barth|Mazen Kiwan|Chantal Banlier|Jacqueline Cassard|Brigitte Chamarande|Emmanuel Faure|Pascal Franks|Pierre Galliard|Florent Gibassier|Vincent Guillerminet|Joëlle Legua|Isabelle Leprince|Isabelle Mamère|Jean-Pierre Niobe|Cécile Peroua|Taïeb|Michel Vivier
keywords: murder|bridesmaid|obsessive love|reference to woody allen|post coital scene
title: La dama de honor
